arts.ttl: Phil Foden given detailed feedback from Pep Guardiola during impromptu on-pitch training session after Man City star plays 90 minutes as a false nine in Carabao Cup win over Watford
arts.sum: Foden touched the ball 80 times, played two key passes and registered six shots, although only one of them hit the target. After the final whistle, Guardiola had some words of advice for the 24-year-old.

arts.ttl: Player Ratings: Nunes, Doku, Lewis start for Man City as Ince scores Watford stunner
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides player ratings from Manchester City's 2-1 victory over Watford in the EFL Cup third round.

arts.ttl: Guardiola: Rodri needs surgery and 'out for long, long time'
arts.sum: Manchester City midfielder Rodri will be out for "a long, long time" and requires surgery, manager Pep Guardiola has said.

arts.ttl: Manchester City 2 Watford 1 - how the action unfolded
arts.sum: A minute-by-minute account of Watford's 2-1 defeat at the Etihad in the Carabao Cup.

arts.ttl: Man City edge past Watford in first look at life without Rodri
arts.sum: First-half goals from Jeremy Doku and Matheus Nunes booked Manchester City's place in the Carabao Cup last 16 despite a late scare in their 2-1 win over Watford.
Highlights of the Carabao Cup third round match between Manchester City and Watford.

arts.ttl: Man City vs Watford bizarrely hijacked by FC Twente ultras as Dutch fans take over Etihad before Utd clash
arts.sum: Some Twente fans decided to make it two games in two days with a trip to the Etihad

arts.ttl: Man City 2-1 Watford: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Doku, Nunes score
arts.sum: Goals from Jeremy Doku and Matheus Nunes help Manchester City beat Watford 2-1 in the EFL Cup third round at the Etihad Stadium.

arts.ttl: Matheus Nunes eases Manchester City through despite Tom Ince cracker
arts.athr: Jamie Jackson at the Etihad Stadium
arts.sum: With Manchester City missing Rodri for the first time since his serious knee injury, this victory against Watford, the Championship’s eighth-placed side, offers scant clues regarding how they may cope in the long term. For that, the trip to Newcastle on Saturday will offer more insight into Pep Guardiola’s plan, and which senior player the manager trusts to deputise for the 28-year-old in the pivotal midfield role. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Much-changed Manchester City see off Watford in Carabao Cup
arts.sum: Jeremy Doku and Matheus Nunes scored in a 2-1 win.
